includedAssets.title: The Mechanic
includedAssets.synopsis: Ace assassin Jason Statham becomes a target when he agrees to teach reckless Ben Foster the art of contract killing. Gritty action thriller.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ace assassin Jason Statham becomes a target when he agrees to teach reckless Ben Foster the art of contract killing. Gritty action thriller.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ace assassin Jason Statham becomes a target when he agrees to teach reckless Ben Foster the art of contract killing. Gritty action thriller.

includedAssets.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
includedAssets.synopsis: Crack hitman Arthur Bishop (Jason Statham) thought he had put his murderous past behind him when his most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life (Jessica Alba). Now he is forced to travel the globe - from Sydney to Rio - to complete three impossible assassinations, and do what he does best: make them look like accidents.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Master assassin Jason Statham is blackmailed into carrying out a series of nigh-on impossible hits. Action thriller sequel with Jessica Alba.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Crack hitman Arthur Bishop (Jason Statham) thought he had put his murderous past behind him when his most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life (Jessica Alba). Now he is forced to travel the globe - from Sydney to Rio - to complete three impossible assassinations, and do what he does best: make them look like accidents.

includedAssets.title: The Mechanic Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Jason Statham is master hitman Arthur Bishop in this pair of pulse-racing action thrillers. Bishop is first tasked with training his former mentor's hot-headed son in 2011's The Mechanic, before embarking on a mission to save the love of his life in 2016's Mechanic: Resurrection.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jason Statham is master hitman Arthur Bishop in this pair of pulse-racing action thrillers. Includes 2016's Mechanic: Resurrection.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jason Statham is master hitman Arthur Bishop in this pair of pulse-racing action thrillers. Bishop is first tasked with training his former mentor's hot-headed son in 2011's The Mechanic, before embarking on a mission to save the love of his life in 2016's Mechanic: Resurrection.
